biotools.summary: A method for parsing and filtering VCF files for admixture analysis. The method is able to filters SNPs to allow the delineation of population structure in ADMIXTURE and parses the output for summarization and graphical representation via CLUMPAK.

bioschemas.name: ADMIXPIPE
bioschemas.summary: A method for parsing and filtering VCF files for admixture analysis. The method is able to filters SNPs to allow the delineation of population structure in ADMIXTURE and parses the output for summarization and graphical representation via CLUMPAK.
